Class RestfulModelMap

Direct Known Subclasses:
RestfulNameValueModelMap, RestfulStringModelMap
public abstract class RestfulModelMap
extends ModelMap

Abstract implementation of ModelMap representing a domain model instance mapped to a RESTful web service resource.
